data.text: Tsoka kwa amene amapita ku Igupto kukapempha chithandizo,
Komatu Yehovayo ndi wanzeru ndipo angathe kuwononga,
Aigupto ndi anthu chabe osati Mulungu;
Zimene Yehova akunena kwa ine ndi izi:
Monga mbalame zowuluka pamwamba pa zisa zake,
Inu Aisraeli, bwererani kwa Iye amene munamuwukira kwakukulu.
Pakuti tsiku limenelo nonsenu mudzataya mafano anu a siliva ndi golide amene mumapanga ndi manja anu auchimo.
